LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.label: orbital trade beacon
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon.description: Required for orbital trading. You can only sell goods that are near an orbital trade beacon. Can be placed indoors.
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon_Blueprint.label: orbital trade beacon (blueprint)
LanguageData.OrbitalTradeBeacon_Frame.label: orbital trade beacon (building)
LanguageData.CommsConsole.label: comms console
LanguageData.CommsConsole.description: Allows radio contact with remote traders as well as other factions for trade and diplomacy.
LanguageData.CommsConsole_Blueprint.label: comms console (blueprint)
LanguageData.CommsConsole_Frame.label: comms console (building)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper.label: firefoam popper
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper.description: When touched by fire or triggered by hand, this pops and sprays a fire-extinguishing foam in a circular field around itself.
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Blueprint.label: firefoam popper (blueprint)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Blueprint_Install.label: firefoam popper (blueprint)
LanguageData.FirefoamPopper_Frame.label: firefoam popper (building)
LanguageData.MoisturePump.label: moisture pump
LanguageData.MoisturePump.description: Very slowly removes moisture from nearby terrain, converting marshes or shallow water into dry ground. Does not affect deep water.
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Blueprint.label: moisture pump (blueprint)
LanguageData.MoisturePump_Frame.label: moisture pump (building)
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.label: ground-penetrating scanner
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner.description: A downward-facing penetrating radar, combined with sonar and magnetic imagers, allows you to detect (but not identify) minerals buried deep under the surface. Requires a huge amount of electricity.
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner_Blueprint.label: ground-penetrating scanner (blueprint)
LanguageData.GroundPenetratingScanner_Frame.label: ground-penetrating scanner (building)
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.label: long-range mineral scanner
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner.description: Automatically detects precious minerals like gold or jade in the nearby areas (but not in which it was built). The lumps are found on average once per 30 days within a radius of 30 tiles. Building more than one scanner in the same or nearby areas has little to no effect.
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner_Blueprint.label: long-range mineral scanner (blueprint)
LanguageData.LongRangeMineralScanner_Frame.label: long-range mineral scanner (building)
LanguageData.PodLauncher.label: pod launcher
LanguageData.PodLauncher.description: A fueling port for launching one transport pod. Pod launchers can launch as a group - but the launchers must be placed adjacent to each other.
LanguageData.PodLauncher_Blueprint.label: pod launcher (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodLauncher_Frame.label: pod launcher (building)
LanguageData.TransportPod.label: transport pod
LanguageData.TransportPod.description: A launchable suborbital-travel cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for transport, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
LanguageData.TransportPod_Blueprint.label: transport pod (blueprint)
LanguageData.TransportPod_Frame.label: transport pod (building)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Increases research speed. Needs to be placed near hi-tech research bench. One research bench can be linked to only one multi-analyzer.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Blueprint.label: multi-analyzer (blueprint)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Blueprint_Install.label: multi-analyzer (blueprint)
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer_Frame.label: multi-analyzer (building)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Increases patients treatment quality. Needs to be placed adjacent to a medical bed. One medical bed can be linked to only one vitals monitor.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Blueprint.label: vitals monitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Blueprint_Install.label: vitals monitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor_Frame.label: vitals monitor (building)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet.label: tool cabinet
LanguageData.ToolCabinet.description: Increases work speed. Needs to be placed near workbench. One workbench can be simultaneously linked to only two tools cabinets.
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Blueprint.label: tool cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Blueprint_Install.label: tool cabinet (blueprint)
LanguageData.ToolCabinet_Frame.label: tool cabinet (building)
LanguageData.Grave.label: grave
LanguageData.Grave.description: Place the dead in graves to give them a decent final resting place. Colonists will visit full graves to gain meditative joy.
LanguageData.Grave_Blueprint.label: grave (blueprint)
LanguageData.Grave_Frame.label: grave (building)
LanguageData.Sarcophagus.label: sarcophagus
LanguageData.Sarcophagus.description: An ornamented burial receptacle for the honored dead.
LanguageData.Sarcophagus_Blueprint.label: sarcophagus (blueprint)
LanguageData.Sarcophagus_Frame.label: sarcophagus (building)
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket.description: A self-powered sarcophagus designed to keep a person in a state of suspended animation for many years.
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket_Blueprint.label: cryptosleep casket (blueprint)
LanguageData.CryptosleepCasket_Frame.label: cryptosleep casket (building)
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepCasket.label: ancient cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.AncientCryptosleepCasket.description: This cryptosleep casket looks like it has been here for a very long time. Who knows what it might contain?
LanguageData.MarriageSpot.label: marriage spot
LanguageData.MarriageSpot.description: Designates a spot where marriage ceremonies will take place. Spectators can watch from either side.
LanguageData.MarriageSpot_Blueprint.label: marriage spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.MarriageSpot_Frame.label: marriage spot (building)
LanguageData.PartySpot.label: party spot
LanguageData.PartySpot.description: Designates a spot where parties will be centered. Parties use an area around the spot.
LanguageData.PartySpot_Blueprint.label: party spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.PartySpot_Frame.label: party spot (building)
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot.label: caravan packing spot
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot.description: Designates a spot where caravans will be formed.
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot_Blueprint.label: caravan packing spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.CaravanPackingSpot_Frame.label: caravan packing spot (building)
